body: Great art.

I'm not fighting nor criticising other ppl's fetishes (how could I when I myself have a weird invisible/ghost fetish) but everytime a new entry pops up with the "invisible" tag on, I get super excited only to find something that is OBVIOUSLY NOT in-fucking-visible, which is super annoying after all these years 🙄
Kinda like those Retarded JAV plots? I aint judging, just pointing things out, you do you.

@Blasto At this point, I'm starting to suspect that you're fetish shaming. I've seen you on many of these types of comics. It's alright to dislike, or even hate, this type of fetish, but please don't go around shiting of peoples fetishes. It's rather rude. You wouldn't like it if I started going on all your favorite doujins and started talking shit about them, would you? So stop doing this. Please. We came here to fap, not fight.
weird ass fetish

@Keksz YES I know that, thank you SO MUCH, this is EXACTLY what I'm complaining about. Let me show you what "invisible" REALLY is:
#234632 THIS is invisible 
#237669 THIS is invisible
#353351 THIS is invisible 
#351436 THIS is NOT! And these are just a few examples among many others, but they're unfortunately drowned in a sea of dumb and shitty hentai like this one

@Grimreaper339 yes also, but ngl this fetish is dumb af as others have said before below. Like if the "invisible" dude is standing right in front of you while you're watching tv, you'll just wonder "strange, why can't I see the tv" and not notice something's wrong? Dumb concept made by dumb artists
We need more

@Blasto Someone never actually researched Invisible porn and it shows. The invisible MC is almost always shown to the readers/watchers of said porn, the invisible part is towards the rest of the characters mainly whoever the MC is fucking.

@Blasto This type of fetish is called, "Invisible to Surroundings". However, since there is no tag specifying that fetish, the closest thing to that is invisible. So if you want to blame someone, blame the website for not having the tag.
10/10 no questions asked.

@Kami Nana you're the dumbass here pal, if mf is shown, whether it is to the characters or the audience it's not IN-VISIBLE! And in that case you don't put the fucking tag. You're as stupid as the artist

@Blasto And you're an idiot that can't seem to understand that he's just shown to US, the audience, so we know what he's doing exactly.
